name: Infiltration Addict
description:
What is incompatible ? Infiltrate a building and flirt. So, you play Jean-Max who have to be discreet because he is in a building full of men, women and chicken in suits. But, if you are discovered, you have to seduce the people who discover you !

This game was created for Ludum Dare 41 by the Jammin' ! team.
